pr_title: Annotation processors may generate class files:

timeline.message:
Annotation processors may generate class files:
-that have a name different from any source file in the source roots
-even while running in the editor

But neither of these seems to be working - fixing.

timeline.bodyText: This is the meat of the fix - the above attempts to compute the target class folder might have failed, because, if sibling is null, it will try to find the original source root based on "baseName" - but if the newly generated classfile's name does not correspond to any source file (which is valid, of course), this search fails. So adding a new layer, using the "siblings" utility.
timeline.author: jlahoda
